ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported
e.g., ''Thinking of your entire lifetime'' or ''Since April 1, 2020''

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - How often do you drink at bars, taverns, or cocktail lounges? Would you say...
Notes: 1 = Every day or nearly every day; 2 = At least once a week; 3 = At least once a month (but less than 1/week); 4 = At least once within [nas_recall] (but less than 1/month); 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = Refused; 888=No response

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - When you drink at a bar, tavern, or cocktail lounge, how many drinks do you typically have?
[nas_recall] - How often do you drink at a party in someone's home?
Notes: 1 = Every day or nearly every day; 2 = At least once a week; 3 = At least once a month (but less than 1/week); 4 = At least once within [nas_recall] (but less than 1/month); 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = Refused; 888=No response

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - When you drink at a party in someone's home, how many drinks do you typically have?
[nas_recall] - How often do you drink when spending a quiet evening at home?
Notes: 1 = Every day or nearly every day; 2 = At least once a week; 3 = At least once a month (but less than 1/week); 4 = At least once within [nas_recall] (but less than 1/month); 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = Refused; 888=No response

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - When you drink on a quiet evening at home, how many drinks do you typically have?
[nas_recall] - How often have you met with friends or family over the internet or on live social media where you drink alcohol together?
Notes: 1 = Every day or nearly every day; 2 = At least once a week; 3 = At least once a month (but less than 1/week); 4 = At least once within [nas_recall] (but less than 1/month); 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = Refused; 888=No response

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - When spending time with friends in a public place, such as a park, street, or parking lot?
Notes: 1 = Every day or nearly every day; 2 = At least once a week; 3 = At least once a month (but less than 1/week); 4 = At least once within [nas_recall] (but less than 1/month); 5 = Never within [nas_recall]; 97 = Do not know; 99 = Refused; 888=No response
